channel.title: 欢迎来到我的个人博客 • Posts by "c++" category

item.title: vscode中C++输出中文乱码
item.description: <p><strong>在 settings.json 中加入以下片段</strong></p> <figure class="highlight json"><figcaption data-lang="JSON"></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token property">"code-runner.executorMap"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token punctuation">&#123;</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre> <span class="token property">"c"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"cd $dir &amp;&amp; gcc -fexec-charset=GBK $fileName -o $fileNameWithoutExt &amp;&amp; $dir$fileNameWithoutExt"</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre> <span class="token property">"cpp"</span><span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"cd $dir &amp;&amp; g++ -fexec-charset=GBK $fileName -o $fileNameWithoutExt &amp;&amp; $dir$fileNameWithoutExt"</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">&#125;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><p><strong>原文链接</strong>：<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzUyNTQ5MTk2L2FydGljbGUvZGV0YWlscy8xMjAzMTg5MTM=">https://blog.csdn.net/qq_52549196/article/details/120318913</span></p>
